TopicTitle: Is there a type of space navigation and guidance system out there?

Articles.Content:
SO I\'m having a blast with KSP and the orbital calculator. As much as I love launching rockets again and again, it gets a bit tiresome, with trial and error(mostly error).

I was wondering is there software out there for plotting navigation and guidance in space, under theoretical or experimental conditions(not just fore kerbal use, but adjustable parameter like the size of planets or the number of planets and their orbits), for someone like myself how lacks skill(a google maps for oblital projection)?
The next update (0.15) will precisely bring new navigation to the game so you can plot orbits and launches much better now, it should be released within a few weeks if all goes well
MechJeb gives you a really good autopilot system, if that\'s what you want.
Well I heard about something like that in v 0.15 so we gotta wait until it comes out
